title: Commercial Cleaning Appointment Setter
job_overview:
We are looking for a skilled and reliable Appointment Setter to help schedule walkthroughs for commercial cleaning services. You'll be responsible for cold calling local businesses, introducing our services, and booking on-site appointments (walkthroughs) for quotes.

Pay: $2.50 per hour + $50 per qualified appointment set (must be confirmed by the business and result in an on-site walkthrough).

Requirements: Fluent in English with clear, professional phone presence

Experience in appointment setting or cold calling

Must be comfortable calling business owners, office managers, and facility managers

Able to use a provided script and CRM to log activity

Must be available during U.S. business hours (your choice of timezone)

Quiet work environment and high-speed internet

What We Provide:

Dialer and phone system access

Targeted call lists (local businesses in specific areas)

Scripts and objection handling guides

Training and ongoing support

About Us:
We work with commercial cleaning companies across the U.S. and help them grow by setting up on-site walkthroughs with office buildings, schools, medical facilities, warehouses, and more.

Only apply if you're confident in your ability to get decision-makers on the phone and book real appointments.
